sqls.sql: SELECT ss_tbl3_f1, ss_tbl3_f2, ss_tbl3_f3, ss_tbl3_f4, ss_tbl3_f5, ss_tbl3_f6, ss_tbl3_f7, ss_tbl3_f8, ss_tbl3_f9, ss_tbl3_f10, ss_tbl3_f11, ss_tbl3_f12, ss_tbl3_f13, ss_tbl3_f14, ss_tbl3_f15, ss_tbl3_f16, ss_tbl3_f17, ss_tbl3_f18, ss_tbl3_f19, ss_tbl3_f20, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM ss_tbl3 WHERE ss_tbl3_id = @ss_tbl3_id;
